item.title: 508 help

item.description:
@lolzurCoaster wrote:

Im trying to make myself admin on my 508 source. but for seome reaosn nothing works.

I tried to go into login…i tried searching for p.rigts(nothing under it was there) i even tried to go into login.java and add

       if (p.username.equals("lulzorz")) {
            p.rights = 2;
        }

still no good… what am i doing wrong. i cant go to chars and put rights 2. so wtf can i do to make myself admin lol. im going krazy =p
